3.2. d1baseclient¶

3.2.1. Module d1_client.d1baseclient¶

This module implements DataONEBaseClient, which extends RESTClient with DataONE specific functionality common to Coordinating Nodes and Member Nodes.

Created:

2011-01-20
Author:

DataONE (vieglais, dahl)
Dependencies:
  • python 2.6

Classes

DataONEBaseClient(baseurl[, defaultHeaders, ...]) Implements DataONE client functionality common between Member and

Exceptions

HTTPException
